title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the software, the CVS repository view loses its maximized state. It is no longer taking up the entire screen.
EB: The expected behavior is that a view that is maximized should remain maximized even after switching perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the software and maximize the CVS repository view. 
2. Switch to a different perspective. 
3. Observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
